title: A real challenger 1/4 complete with no missions available **Can't complete**  please help

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Hi! I completed all the other missions (Destroying towers, dragons, etc) but now I'm stuck on this mission and it says 1/4 completed, I believe it's because I completed some missions on the same game

replies.body: Oh so this is a Pay to Win mission,  gotcha

A Real Challenger is an Overall mission for the event.  You'll want to get the Worlds pass to reach 3/4 for the remainder of Week 1.  Once Week 2 starts, you should be able to get credit for the fourth and unlock the next part of the Overall mission.
